# sensorsActive

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the sensors that compute the motion data are active.

## Declaration

```swift
var sensorsActive: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

[doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] if the sensors are active; otherwise, [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false].

## Accessing Sensor Data

- **sensorsRequireManualActivation**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the sensors that compute the motion data require manual activation.
